name: microservices-status-dashboard
description: Real-time monitoring dashboard for microservices health status

scripts.build: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const config = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('config/services.json', 'utf8')); console.log('✓ Configuration file is valid'); console.log('✓ Found', config.services.length, 'services configured'); process.exit(0);"
